Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.utils

Class ObjectClickListeners

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.utils.ObjectClickListeners
public class ObjectClickListeners extends Object
This static class contains all the methods that are called when one element in the dining room is clicked
